The Carbon Tax will only continue to rise. Get ahead of the tax by reducing your carbon footprint today!

The Energy Consumer Price Index is likely to continue to rise steeply. Mitigate your budget risks by investing in solar!

{{f1 | safe}}
Did you know:

1. "As a rule of thumb we can install 1 kW of solar panels in 100 square feet of shadow free area on a reinforced cement concrete (RCC) roof."
2. "According to Energy Hub, solar panels in Alberta can produce about 1276 hours of energy."
3. "According to Energy Hub, installation cost of solar panels in Alberta is about $2.51 - $2.77/Watt."

This means you can earn back you investment in 11.8 to 13 years assuming an average electricity cost of $0.167/kWh, without considering incentives
